text: midneun salamdeul-iyeo ganeunghan ui sim-eul pihala eotteon il-e iss-eoseoui uisim-eun hanaui joeag-ila geuligo seologa seololeul gamsihaji malmyeo seo loga seololeul heomdamhaji malla neohui jung-e jug-eun hyeongje-ui sal-eul meoggoja ha neunja amudo eobsnola sillo neohuineun geugeos-eul jeung-ohalila hananim-eul dulyeo wo hala sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa ja bilo chungmanhasinila
